faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? We have the answers.

questions.question: What frameworks does Nubitech support?
questions.answer: Nubitech natively supports all modern JavaScript frameworks: Next.js, React, Vue, Svelte, Astro, and many more. We also support static sites and Node.js backend applications.

questions.question: How does automatic scaling work?
questions.answer: Our infrastructure monitors your application's traffic in real-time. When the load increases, we automatically provision new resources to maintain optimal performance, and we scale them down when traffic decreases to optimize costs.

questions.question: Can I use my own domain name?
questions.answer: Yes, absolutely. On all our paid plans, you can easily connect your own domain name. We also provide a free and automatic SSL certificate for each custom domain.

questions.question: What type of customer support do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer email support for the Discovery plan. The Pro plan benefits from priority support via email and chat. The Enterprise plan includes 24/7 dedicated support with a personal account manager and guaranteed SLAs.

questions.question: Is security a priority?
questions.answer: Security is at the heart of our platform. All applications benefit from DDoS protection, managed firewalls, and continuous monitoring. We conduct regular security audits to ensure the protection of your data.
